item.title: 特朗普的贸易战在 24 小时内打击了数十亿美元的交易
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普的全球贸易战在不到 24 小时内打击了价值数十亿美元的潜在并购和首次公开募股。【原文：Donald Trump’s global trade war has hit billions of dollars worth of potential mergers, acquisitions and initial public offerings in less than 24 hours.】

item.title: 巴菲特称 X 和 TikTok 上归于他的评论 "都是假的
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.【原文：Berkshire Hathaway Inc. said Friday that all reports circulating on social media sites including X, TikTok and Facebook “regarding comments allegedly made” by Warren Buffett are false.】

item.title: 如果经济衰退不可避免，S&P 仍有很大下跌空间
item.description: 自科维德疫情爆发以来，美国股市出现了最迅猛的下跌，这使得估值看起来很便宜。但如果唐纳德-特朗普总统的关税引发的全球贸易战导致经济衰退不可避免，那么便宜的定义就变得相对了。【原文：The fasetst US stock market selloff since the depths of the Covid pandemic has left valuations looking cheap. But if a recession is inevitable due to the global trade war sparked by President Donald Trump’s tariffs, the definition of inexpensive becomes relative.】

item.title: 特朗普关税激怒市场后，Klarna 和 StubHub 暂停 IPO 计划
item.description: 金融科技巨头克拉纳集团（Klarna Group Plc）和票务平台StubHub控股公司（StubHub Holdings Inc.【原文：Fintech giant Klarna Group Plc and ticket platform StubHub Holdings Inc. are pausing plans for initial public offerings, people with knowledge of the matter said, after the US announced wide-ranging tariffs that sent the stock market into a tailspin.】

item.title: 散户不断涌入美股，但步伐正在放缓
item.description: 周五，个人投资者纷纷将现金投入他们喜爱的股票和交易所交易基金，押注美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易战引发的市场大跌将带来长期的买入机会。【原文：Individual investors were plowing cash into their favorite stocks and exchange-traded funds on Friday, betting that a market selloff triggered by US President Donald Trump’s trade war would present a buying opportunity in the long run.】

item.title: 特朗普的关税政策颠覆了他对钻井的推动，页岩股遭受重创
item.description: 随着原油价格暴跌，以及唐纳德-特朗普总统的贸易战与他加快美国能源生产的目标背道而驰，页岩油公司在华尔街遭受了一些沉重打击。【原文：Shale-oil companies are taking some of the harder lumps on Wall Street as crude prices tumble and President Donald Trump’s trade war runs headlong into his goal to turbocharge US energy production.】

item.title: 国税局让网络安全人员在报税季期间休假
item.description: 2025 年 2 月 18 日星期二，美国华盛顿特区的国内税收署（IRS）总部。一群纳税人和工会正在起诉特朗普政府，指控埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的政府效率机构不应该获得数百万美国公民的纳税记录。【原文：The Internal Revenue Service (IRS) headquarters in Washington, DC, US, on Tuesday, Feb. 18, 2025. A group of taxpayers and unions is suing the Trump administration alleging Elon Musk's government efficiency agency shouldn't be given access to the tax records of millions of US citizens.】

item.title: 特朗普加征关税，意大利央行下调 2025 年展望
item.description: 意大利银行下调了今年的经济增长预期，认为美国新关税将阻碍欧元区第三大经济体的扩张。【原文：The Bank of Italy cut its forecast for growth this year, reckoning that new US tariffs will hold back expansion in the euro zone’s third-biggest economy.】

item.title: 期权波动率飙升显示股市下滑变得混乱不堪
item.description: 一度井然有序的市场抛售变得更加混乱，交易商争相抛售期权，使期权市场波动率达到 8 月初震荡以来的最高点。【原文：The once-orderly market selloff has gotten messier, with traders scrambling for cover sending options market volatility to the highest since the early August shock.】

item.title: 投资者寻求关税避风港，市政债券延续涨势
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的关税政策激起了人们对经济衰退的担忧，投资者为躲避美国股市下挫而寻求避风港，州政府和地方政府债务连续第二天反弹。【原文：State and local government debt rallied for a second day as investors sought shelter from the sinking US stock market after President Donald Trump’s tariffs stoked fears about an economic downturn.】

item.title: 关税激怒市场后，StubHub 暂停 IPO 计划
item.description: 票务平台 StubHub 控股公司（StubHub Holdings Inc.【原文：Ticket platform StubHub Holdings Inc. is pausing plans for an initial public offering, a person with knowledge of the matter said, after wide-ranging plans for tariffs sent the stock market into a tailspin.】

item.title: 全球经济衰退 贸易因关税报复吞噬华尔街
item.description: 在金融市场的每个角落，从股票、债券到大宗商品，资金经理们都在向唐纳德-特朗普发出同样明确无误的信息：他发动的贸易战有可能引发全球经济衰退，而且速度很快。【原文：In every corner of the financial markets, from stocks to bonds to commodities, money managers are sending Donald Trump the same unmistakable message: The trade war he unleashed is threatening to set off a worldwide recession — and fast.】

item.title: 任天堂在特朗普加征关税后推迟 Switch 2 预售
item.description: 任天堂公司表示，由于担心美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收全球关税的影响，该公司将推迟新款 Switch 2 的预订。【原文：Nintendo Co. said it’s delaying pre-orders for the new Switch 2 due to concerns over the impact of global tariffs instituted by US President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 耐克、Lululemon飙升，特朗普称与越南的通话富有成效
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在Truth Social网站上发文称，他与越南总统杜林（To Lam）进行了一次 "非常有成效的通话"，并表示越南希望 "将关税降至零"，此后包括耐克公司（Nike Inc.）和Lululemon Athletica公司（Lululemon Athletica Inc.）在内的越南股票周五飙升。【原文：Stocks exposed to Vietnam including Nike Inc. and Lululemon Athletica Inc. soared on Friday after President Donald Trump said he had a “very productive call” with Vietnam’s To Lam and said the country wants to “cut their tariffs down to zero” in a post on Truth Social.】

item.title: 鲍威尔表示美联储将应对持续通胀冲击
item.description: 美联储主席杰罗姆-鲍威尔（Jerome Powell）表示，新关税对经济的影响可能大大超过预期，央行必须确保这不会导致通胀问题日益严重。【原文：Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell said the economic impact of new tariffs is likely to be significantly larger than expected, and the central bank must make sure that doesn’t lead to a growing inflation problem.】

item.title: 希腊船只千里迢迢运送俄罗斯石油
item.description: 三艘希腊油轮绕道数千英里，将原油从俄罗斯波罗的海运往亚洲的定制港口。【原文：Three Greek oil tankers are going on detours of thousands of miles to deliver crude from Russia’s Baltic Sea to customres in Asia.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势加剧，拉美股市创五年来最大跌幅
item.description: 由于对美国可能出现经济衰退的担忧刺激了整个市场的避险情绪，并打击了大宗商品价格，拉美股市周五全线下滑，创下近五年来最惨淡的一个交易日。【原文：Latin American stocks slumped across the board on Friday in their wost session in nearly five years as fears of a potential US recession spurred risk-aversion across markets and pummeled commodities prices.】

item.title: 关于关税的六点思考
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 纽森称加州已准备好与贸易伙伴谈判
item.description: 加利福尼亚州州长加文-纽森（Gavin Newsom）表示，他将寻求建立新的国际贸易伙伴关系，以抵制唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）提出的关税建议，并将该州视为抵制他所谓的 "我们一生中最大的加税举措 "的堡垒。【原文：California Governor Gavin Newsom said he will pursue new international trade partnerships to counter Donald Trump’s proposed tariffs, casting the state as a bulwark against what he called the “largest tax hike of our lifetime.”】

item.title: 特朗普关税忧虑袭来，加拿大股市陷入调整
item.description: 由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普对主要贸易伙伴征收关税引发了对经济衰退的担忧，加拿大股市周五陷入调整。【原文：Canadian stocks sank into a correction on Friday as US President Donald Trump’s tariffs on major trading partners spark fears of a recession.】

item.title: 需求激增，无人机制造商 Tekever 提升产能
item.description: 无人机制造商 Tekever Ltd. 计划随着无人机系统在军事和商业领域应用的增长而不断扩大产能。【原文：Drone maker Tekever Ltd. plans to keep expanding its production capacity as military and commercial use of unmanned aerial systems grows.】

item.title: 特朗普关税引发熊市，纳斯达克 100 指数步入熊市
item.description: 纳斯达克 100 指数（Nasdaq 100）从 2 月份的高点跌落，跌幅超过 20%，投资者抛弃了曾经高歌猛进的科技股，市场陷入颓势，纳斯达克指数跌入熊市。【原文：The Nasdaq 100 plunged toward a bear market as its losses from a February high surged past 20% as investors ditch once high-flying tech shares in a broard market rout.】

item.title: ESPN 称美巡赛拒绝沙特基金 15 亿美元投资
item.description: 据 ESPN 报道，PGA 巡回赛拒绝了沙特阿拉伯公共投资基金 15 亿美元的投资。【原文：The PGA Tour has declined a $1.5 billion investment from Saudi Arabia’s Public Investment Fund, according to ESPN.】

item.title: 圣戈班停止 25 亿欧元的汽车玻璃出售计划
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，由于美国总统唐纳德-特朗普发动贸易战，市场波动剧烈，圣戈班集团决定暂缓出售其汽车玻璃部门。【原文：Cie. de Saint-Gobain has decided to hold off on a sale of its auto glass unit as market volatility surges on US President Donald Trump’s trade war, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 丰业银行聘用 Eilers 共同领导企业与投资银行
item.description: 加拿大丰业银行（Bank of Nova Scotia）聘请瑞银集团（UBS Group AG）前高管马特-埃勒斯（Matt Eilers）担任企业与投资银行部全球联席主管，继续进军美国资本市场。【原文：Bank of Nova Scotia hired former UBS Group AG executive Matt Eilers as global co-head of corporate and investment-banking as the Canadian lender continues its push into US capital markets.】

item.title: 欧洲央行降息预期升温，增长成为关税担忧之首
item.description: 投资者和分析师在评估唐纳德-特朗普关税的影响后认为，通胀的结果将更加温和，而经济增长将受到影响，因此对欧洲央行降息的预期正在升温。【原文：Expectations for European Central Bank interest-rate cuts are rising as investors and analysts assessing the fallout from Donald Trump’s tariffs conclude that the outcome for inflation will be more benign while growth will suffer.】

item.title: 罗杰斯向养老金支持的 Blackstone 基金出售 50 亿美元网络股份
item.description: Rogers Communications Inc. 同意将其无线网络股份出售给 Blackstone Inc.【原文：Rogers Communications Inc. agreed to sell a stake in its wireless network to funds managed by Blackstone Inc. in a C$7 billion ($4.9 billion) equity deal backed by four Canadian pensions.】

item.title: 美国薪资增长超出预期，失业率略有上升
item.description: 美国 3 月份的就业增长超过预期，失业率有所上升，这表明在全球经济受到广泛关税打击之前，劳动力市场将保持健康。【原文：US job growth beat forecasts in March and the unemployment rate edged up, pointing to a healthy labor market before the global economy gets hit by widespread tariffs.】

item.title: 如何保护孩子的上网安全
item.description:
非营利组织的专家表示，数字安全应从家庭开始，进行开放式对话，不回避令人尴尬或恐惧的问题。【原文：

Experts from nonprofits say digital safety starts at home with an open dialogue that doesn’t shy away from the embarrassing — or the terrifying. 

】
